instructions.de: Leicht links weiter auf Cool highway
instructions.en: Continue slightly left onto Cool highway
instructions.es: Continua ligeramente a la izquierda en Cool highway
instructions.fr: Continuer légèrement à gauche sur Cool highway
instructions.id: Tetap agak di kiri ke Cool highway
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj łagodnie w lewo na Cool highway
instructions.ru: Плавно поверните налево на Cool highway
instructions.sv: Fortsätt med lätt vänstersväng in på Cool highway
instructions.vi: Nghiêng về bên trái vào Cool highway
